sentence: Some Republicans believe House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy's actions against Rep. Liz Cheney or silence when the party moves to punish her undermine his claim that the GOP is a big tent? party.
title: McCarthy picks his path on Cheney: Try to boot her from Congress

sentence: The Post's Marianna Sotomayor takes a look at the controversy and what it tells us about Stefanik, who has sought to firmly align herself with former president Donald Trump and his nativist Make America Great Again? agenda over the last year after she replaced Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
author: Mariana Alfaro
title: Post Politics Now Ukraine aid, baby formula shortages, high gas prices on agenda for Congress
